thread.title: Golden Retriever Pup Just Wants to Play With His Reflection

author: Hedy Phillips
title: Golden Retriever Pup Just Wants to Play With His Reflection
text:
Puppy Sees Reflection in Mirror | Video Golden Retriever Pup Just Wants to Play With His Reflection March 23, 2017 174 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
Let the record show that we think Golden Retrievers are adorable . They're silly, they're cute, they're smart â€” they're just awesome. This Golden Retriever puppy is no exception. When he sees himself in a mirror for the first time, he's so excited to have a playmate who looks just like him! Check out the video to see his adorable reaction!
